Crimes.Crime_Name: Making false statements to obtain immigration benefits
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of credibility findings in refugee claim rejection
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative due to contradictions in testimony and evidence
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section related to false statements for immigration benefits
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Contradictions between testimony and documentary evidence; failure to seek asylum in the U.S.
Crimes.Application_Error: Inconsistent statements in application and hearing
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA provisions on refugee eligibility and misrepresentation
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Inconsistencies in testimony and lack of corroborating evidence
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of documentation supporting persecution claim
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Assessed as met by reviewing court
Credibility_Issues: Failure to pursue available asylum options
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of credibility finding
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of review on judicial review
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose or pursue asylum in interim country

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of credibility findings in refugee claim rejection
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative due to inconsistencies and lack of evidence
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to seek asylum in the U.S.; contradiction with public records
Crimes.Application_Error: Inconsistent or unsubstantiated claims in refugee application
Crimes.Application_Factor: Credibility of central events in claim
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Misrepresentation and lack of credible supporting evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that credibility was unfairly assessed
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Scope of judicial review of administrative decisions
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to apply for asylum in safe third country
